page.title: 09LAW ENFORCEMENT COVENTRY SW.
page.content: M1{Police}Station in Little Park Street controls the central area & Cheylesmore, Styvechale & Whitley are controlled by M3 division.Each employs 15 beat policemen who are in touch with headquarters & police vehicles,by radio.M1 reported 3766 {crimes}& M3 2087 in the first quarter of 1985.Included are burglary,robbery, indecency,wounding,theft & damage.As expected more crime occurs in more densely populated areas & where larger groups gather in town.Emergency calls are routed to the nearest police station & instructions passed to patrolling police cars.Suspects convicted of minor crimes are tried at the{Magistrates}court,where they may be fined or ordered to complete community service.More serious crimes are dealt with by judge & jury at the {County Court.}
